segments.text: I glance into the kitchen and see the woman polishing her plate so carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink behind her is flooding over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading down, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, standing there in the wet mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are trying to get cookies from the high cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a stool that's about to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could be really dangerous with the slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, reaching up for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how unaware the mom is to all this risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems so serene compared to this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry the boy might hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene just feels like trouble waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor kids, getting into mischief without realizing the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing water is just adding to the potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
